content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1925 â€“ J.R.R. Tolkien's employment at the University of Leeds officially ends.
1943 - Actor Victor Raider-Wexler is born.
1960 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 226.
1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Ingeborg Korff and her pupils.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: Note: Months of the Shire Calendar only have 30 days, so no events have nor will happen on the 31st.
